title: Payback
description: She touches your fingerprints. She knows your thoughts.Yana was my best friend—and Yana wanted me dead.I should hate her for what she tried to do. But the people who stole what she loved most—they did the same to me.Yana still wants revenge, and she doesn’t want my help. Can I really let her walk into a trap?
author: Melinda Metz
